com.underlegendz.corelegendz.utils

Class AnimationUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.underlegendz.corelegendz.utils.AnimationUtils

  • public class AnimationUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing animations to show/hide views and startUrl activities.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AnimationUtils.AnimationEndListener
      A custom listener that implements AnimationListener and overrides onAnimationStart() and onAnimationRepeat() leaving their bodies empty.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AnimationUtils()

      • scaleUp

        public static android.view.animation.Animation scaleUp()
        Sets an animation that scales up a view in 500 milliseconds. Calls scaleUp(long). You must set visibility to View.VISIBLE before starting the animation.
        Returns:
        An Animation set to scale up a view.

      • scaleUp

        public static android.view.animation.Animation scaleUp(long duration)
        Sets an animation that scales up a view in duration milliseconds. You must set visibility to View.VISIBLE before starting the animation.
        Parameters:
        duration - The duration of the animation in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        An Animation set to scale up a view.

      • scaleDown

        public static android.view.animation.Animation scaleDown()
        Sets an animation that scales down a view in 500 milliseconds. Calls scaleDown(long). You must set this view to View.GONE or View.INVISIBLE after the animation has finished.
        Returns:
        An Animation set to scale down a view.

      • scaleDown

        public static android.view.animation.Animation scaleDown(long duration)
        Sets an animation that scales down a view in duration milliseconds. You must set this view to View.GONE or View.INVISIBLE after the animation has finished.
        Parameters:
        duration - The duration of the animation in milliseconds.
        Returns:

        Returns:
        An Animation set to fade in a view.

      • fadeOut

        public static android.view.animation.Animation fadeOut()
        Sets an animation to fade out a view in 500 milliseconds. Calls fadeOut(long). You must set the view's visibility to View.GONE or View.INVISIBLE after the animation ends.
        Returns:
        An Animation set to fade out a view.

      • fadeOut

        public static android.view.animation.Animation fadeOut(long duration)
        Sets an animation to fade out a view in duration milliseconds. You must set the view's visibility to View.GONE or View.INVISIBLE after the animation ends.
        Parameters:
        duration - The duration of the animation in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        An Animation set to fade out a view.

      • inFromRight

        public static android.view.animation.Animation inFromRight()
        Sets an animation to slide in a view from the right side of its parent view in 500 milliseconds. Calls inFromRight(long). Remember your view must be View.VISIBLE.
        Returns:
        An Animation set to make a view enter from the right.

      • inFromRight

        public static android.view.animation.Animation inFromRight(long duration)
        Sets an animation to slide in a view from the right side of its parent view in duration milliseconds. Remember your view must be View.VISIBLE.
        Parameters:
        duration - The duration of the animation in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        An Animation set to make a view enter from the right.

      • outToRight

        public static android.view.animation.Animation outToRight()
        Sets an animation to slide out a view towards the right side of its parent view in 500 milliseconds. Calls outToLeft(long). There's no need to set your view's visibility to View.INVISIBLE nor View.GONE after the animation.
        Returns:
        An Animation set to slide out a view towards the right.

      • outToRight

        public static android.view.animation.Animation outToRight(long duration)
        Sets an animation to slide out a view towards the right side of its parent view in duration milliseconds. There's no need to set your view's visibility to View.INVISIBLE nor View.GONE after the animation.
        Parameters:
        duration - The duration of the animation in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        An Animation set to slide out a view towards the right.
